## The Luxury Effect around our parks

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggmap)

parks <- read_sf('full_study_parks.gpkg')

parks <- parks %>% 
  filter(Name == "Fr√©d√©ric-Back") %>% 
  st_transform(., 3347)

buffer <- st_buffer(parks, 1000) %>% 
  st_transform(., 4326) 


# API: AIzaSyDlRF5BYeskCH7qWtq13WUV5ifG9Q1kT1c
```
